dict.string: What happens when an art director gets married. Our very own Mike Mates got hitched in the woodland splendor of the Pacific Northwest and this invitation system complimented our couple's offbeat style with full wedding-day guidebook, map and scout badges.

The SEOmoz Beginner's Guide to Search Engine Optimization teaches users the basics of SEO. Their current guide was long and cumbersome, making for a difficult read at time.s SEOmoz sought our expertise to help them present their large volume of information in a package that was engaging and easily digestible. Our solution was an illustrative online guide that keeps the subject matter fun and light to make the large volumes of technical information more palatable.
Molly Moon's, a Seattle staple is all about simple, wholesome, feel-good ice cream. We helped Molly Moon's extend their brand into their mobile ice creamery, lip balm line and gift card holder.
Logo, product icons and full website for online brand reputation manager, Visible Technologies.
E-Commerce website for natural beauty product producer, Sweet Beauty.

Old Police Headquarters is a historic complex with beautiful architectural details located in downtown San Diego. A new initiative to transform the property from an abandoned municipal building into a vibrant community experience, featuring a unique blend of restaurants and retailers, demanded a brand story clearly considered from start to finish.
The project began with a renaming of the property from the address driven name of One Pacific to Old Police Headquarters. The new name captures the originality of the buildings history and sets the stage for a vibrant visual story. Marketing materials evoke an aura of casual sophistication with Spanish Mediterranean influences, setting the tone necessary to turn an exclusively Californian location into an extraordinary hub of activity.

Four years after Telluride, Colorado was founded, the New Sheridan Hotel was built in classic Victorian style. Over the past few decades, directional changes left the hotel without a defined voice. Renovations in 2008, including interior design by renowned Nina Campbell, created an opportunity for the New Sheridan to address the entire brand experience.
The New Sheridan’s brand focuses on unprecedented attention to detail in every collateral touchpoint. The same exquisite detail lavished upon the interior design is reflected in every component from custom menu covers and uniforms to maps and to-go cups, for an unforgettably modern brand experience rooted in true old world service ideals.

Revelry Vintners, a Washington wine producer came to us seeking an updated take on their classic wine heritage. Revelry's wine reflects all the quality that one would expect from a good table wine only delivered at a price without pretension. Our solution was a brand and packaging system that honored the pristine aesthetic of classic wine labeling with subtle modern twists in typography, photo style and production methods.

Endurance, a nation-wide provider of quality vehicle service contracts needed a brand overhaul. We helped them align their brand with the vision they shared of providing the best possible coverage in an industry that was tarnished by the self-interested.
By rooting the brand in a straight-forward and empowering value set we applied it consistently from website, to collateral and even employee training. This consistent application resulted in an effortless, attentive and transparent message to be conveyed across all touch-points to Endurance's customers overcoming industry stereotypes and far exceeding expectations.

Historically personal training has been viewed as a luxury reserved for the financially stable. Mode offers a brilliant and flexible training solution with the support of a personal trainer and the strengths and convenience of technology.
Mode’s core concept, flexibility and customization, is expressed throughout the brand system with an icon set representing choice and lifestyle. The new brand communicates the fluid and smooth integration of all aspects of the experience from online support to personal encounters with trainers. Mode is poised to be a leading high-tech, high touch health, fitness and lifestyle solution with an inspirational and empowering attitude.
Logo, website and promotional collateral for Seattle lounge, Belltown Billiards.
Backend - About Us page edit screen

Set in Moab, Utah, Cloudrock is a visionary development establishing a luxury living experience without disturbing the beauty of nature. Our central challenge was to intrigue and motivate potential buyers and investors.
The story of life at Cloudrock is built on the breathtaking experience of the surrounding area. Landscape and adventure sports photography combine with inspiring messaging to complete the picture. Visitors first experience with Cloudrock is attentively guided from initial contact online to exploring desert living with a customized welcome kit of activity cards, maps and promotional gear.

Interurban is known in the industry as a small developer focusing on renewal of historic buildings for modern use. With earned recognition for revitalization efforts, strong commitment to community, and entrepreneurial spirit, Interurban was ready to expand.
Our brand captures the zeitgeist of Interurban’s development style with unique illustrations and bold typographic collages, reflecting the layered nature of urban environments and the sincere interest Interurban has in community development.
Brand identity system for Seattle photographer Amos Morgan.
Ginger Pup Lane, an LA based pet outfitter specializes in fashionable products unique as each pet and its owner.

Building successful retail environments by hand-selecting and placing tenants requires vision and demographic expertise. The Leasing Studio makes these connections for landlords. This specialty company needed a system to tell informed and compelling property stories.
This flexible brand system features customizable presentation materials easily utilized by the client, reflecting The Leasing Studio’s ability to make notable connections. The system includes a debossed folio, custom memo pad for brainstorming, along with overview and capabilities brochures for a more complete story.
Website and interactive guide for Flying Lab Software's latest game: Pirates of the Burning Sea.
Logo and website for tax consultancy, Tax Help Associates.

The Frontier Room, a Seattle Institution since the 1950s, lacked a clearly defined identity. Changes in ownership and shifting neighborhood dynamics left the classic location without a regular crowd.
The Frontier Room’s new brand welcomes current neighborhood dwellers with a fun, quirky, yet modern portrayal of a classic BBQ joint depicted through a series of animals mascots. Built on the revolutionary concept, “Barbeque With Class,” the latest iteration of the Frontier Room now attracts a regular crowd and loyal customer base.

In 1917, adventurers who struck it rich in the Klondike gold rush formed an exclusive men’s club. Today their legacy lives on in Seattle’s premier hospitality project, Arctic Club Hotel—featuring exquisite interiors designed by Candra Scott & Anderson.
Our solution for the Arctic Club Hotel was inspired by the original story of the hotel. A collection of pieces invoking the spirit of the explorers who built the club implores guests to ‘Live Like An Icon’ with historic photography and modern messaging. The brand is further extended with the gentlemanly attitude of The Polar Bar and has inspired many guests to ‘borrow’ more than a few collateral pieces from the hotel.

Situated in the contemporary street-level restaurant space of the historic Arctic Club Hotel, Juno needed a distinct and modern identity.
We worked with the head chef to develop his notion of sampling bounty of each new season and integrated this concept into the core of the Juno brand. Natural colors and cyclical illustrations embody the seasonal rotation of the menu and are utilized throughout components of the brand system.
Logo and stationery system for luxury hotel management group.

Metro Hi Speed came to us as Acumen Associates. As a smaller internet service provider, they needed a boutique service oriented brand that stood apart from the bland, impersonal style characteristic of other technology companies.
Under our care Acumen Associates became Metro Hi Speed, an exceptional brand expressed through a unique retro-futuristic illustration style . Seeing tremendous growth potential in fax services, Metro Hi Speed came to us to launch the subsidiary product brand MetroFax. Within 6 months, Metrofax netted Metro Hi Speed more than all other service offerings combined. This gave them radical new focus, transforming their business model and brand from boutique service provider to a national value driven brand. Together we are now moving into the next phase of product development and brand extension for the MetroFax brand.
Logo & Collateral for Seattle Chinatown Internation District Preservation and Development Authority.
007 themed opening party invitation for Seattle based Hilton.
Interactive promo site for the makers of Carguard, an auto performance enhancing product.
Gourmet peanut producer from North Carolina.
20 Year anniversary dinner invitation for Seattle restaurant, Queen City Grill.
Website for contemporary architecture firm, Insite Works.

As the first high-end, LEED certified mixed-use development located in Washington’s nautical Friday Harbor, 123 West needed a brand and marketing plan that would portray the premium nature of the development without steamrolling the charming character and appeal of a small-town, island retreat.
To showcase the unique offering of this brand, we focused on modularity and texture. Highlighting the rustic nautical environment of Friday Harbor and natural elements of the San Juan landscape, we developed a multi-component marketing kit and website directing audience attention to specific touch points.
Logo and stationery system for holistic personal chef service, Herban Palate.
Seattle family owned Italian restaurant, La Vita e Bella.
Logo & Collateral for Seattle Doggy Daycare, Wags.
Logo, Stationery & Website for Safeharbor, a customer-solutions software company.
Logo, website and collateral for laser light physical therapy centers located throughout Canada.
Logo for interior architecture firm, Thuma Works.
Logo for vintage limousine service, 59 Limo.
Logo and stationery system for Seattle based boutique urban realtor, Funkylofts.
